summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 KIA SORENTO. WHILE DRIVING VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED, BUT FAILED TO ACCELERATE THE VEHICLE WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WOULD INDEPENDENTLY ACCELERATE RANDOMLY. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A LOCAL DEALER (REDDING KIA 418 E. CYPRESS AVENUE, REDDING, CA 96002), BUT THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE WAS NOT DETERMINED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 1,500.
